message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $150?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $160. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my initial offer, but I need to make a bit more than what you're suggesting.

Hi Alice, I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $150. Would you be willing to meet me at $145? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go below $155. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a bit more than $145.
